'''Noto Sans''' is a [[font]] used by {{el|be}} for long text that might be difficult to read when using the default pixel font, [[Mojangles]].{{cn|Was the font actually added for this purpose?|short=1}} It is also used by the [[Minecraft.net]] website and the [[Minecraft Launcher]].

The version of Noto Sans bundled with ''Bedrock Edition'' is 2.000, released in 2017. The same version is used by the Minecraft.net website as a webfont if Noto Sans is not installed locally. The launcher comes with the 1.04 version, released in 2012. For comparison, the latest version available is 2.015, released in 2024.<ref>https://github.com/notofonts/latin-greek-cyrillic/releases/tag/NotoSans-v2.015</ref>

Noto Sans can also refer to a font subfamily which also includes fonts covering non-Latin writing scripts, such as '''Noto Sans CJK''' (also known as '''Source Han Sans'''), which is used for [[wikipedia:Chinese characters|Chinese characters]], [[wikipedia:Kana|kana]] and [[wikipedia:Hangul|hangeul]].

[[Smooth (font)|smooth/]] is a version of Noto Sans rendered into PNG character atlases.
